comment: Smart Data Models - ExcST4B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcST4B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST4B static excitation system with maximum inner loop feedback gain .

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 0.113. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Kg). Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kim
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain output (Kim).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kir
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (Kir).  Typical Value = 10.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (Kp).  Typical Value = 9.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpm
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain output (Kpm).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpr
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (Kpr).  Typical Value = 10.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: lvgate
contents.comment: Selector (LVgate). true = LVgate is part of the block diagram false = LVgate is not part of the block diagram.  Typical Value = false. Default: False

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: thetap
contents.comment: Potential circuit phase angle (thetap).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: uel
contents.comment: Selector (Uel). true = UEL is part of block diagram false = UEL is not part of block diagram.  Typical Value = false. Default: False

contents.name: vbmax
contents.comment: Maximum excitation voltage (Vbmax).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vgmax
contents.comment: Maximum inner loop feedback voltage (Vgmax).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmmax
contents.comment: Maximum inner loop output (Vmmax).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmmin
contents.comment: Minimum inner loop output (Vmmin).  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xl
contents.comment: Reactance associated with potential source (Xl).  Typical Value = 0.124. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
